[[Version_2.0.7|WordPress Version 2.0.7]] consists mainly of minor bugfixes, minor feature enhancement, and security fixes.

*[http://trac.wordpress.org/ticket/3536 Ticket 3536] Page deletion from page-edit-form.php results in AYS prompt
